alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 3:29AM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Trumbull county. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy lake effect snow Saturday night with a cold frontal passage. Bands of locally heavy snow then continue into the Sunday evening. The southern half of Trumbull County is likely to see much lower snowfall totals, in the 1 to 3 inch range. Wind chills in the single digits are expected Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
